tool.name: matchms add key
tool.description: Set metadata key in MSP to static value

configfiles.configfile:
@init_logger@
import matchms from matchms.importing import load_from_msp from matchms.exporting import save_as_msp
#set keys_dict = ({str($k.key): str($k.value) for $k in $attribute_repeat}) matchms.Metadata.set_key_replacements({})
spectra = list(load_from_msp("${spectral_library}", metadata_harmonization = "False")) new_spectra = [] for spectrum in spectra: for key, value in ($keys_dict).items(): spectrum.set(key, value) new_spectra.append(spectrum) save_as_msp(new_spectra, "${output}")

param.label: Spectra file
param.name: spectral_library
param.help: Mass spectral library file to add key.

param.label: Attribute Name
param.name: key
param.help: Name of the attribute which will be assigned to all spectra records in the MSP.

param.label: Value
param.name: value
param.help: Value of the attribute which will be assigned to all spectra records in the MSP.

tool.help: Description The tool take MSP file as an input and take as parameters the name of the attribute and its value which will be assigned to all spectra records in the MSP.
